name: OnO Apps
description: OnO Apps was born in 2009 in Israel out of a passion for advanced mobile devices. The three founding fathers of OnO Apps (Orr, Nimrod, Oded - hence the creative name...) were always about smartphones and decided to pursue this passion and to bring the world high-quality mobile apps. Fast forward to today - there are now 20+ dedicated teammates, and they've created more than 200 apps for 120 customers worldwide.
